name: Back to the Golden Age
overview: How would you like to play the latest Amiga port of a very fine Atari/Amstrad game first released in the early 90's by the well known company Ubisoft? Well now you can with Back to the Golden age; An Arcade, Action sword fighting game where you can explore rooms, castles and dungeons all the while fighting knights, warriors and other strange beasts that lurk in the next screen. What's more... You can buy supplies, find loot and even cast spells, it's a grand game indeed with cool animation, fighting sequences and plenty of gameplay that will keep you occupied for ages.
